INSTRUCTIONS

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 436, 292, 449]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 451, 761, 466]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 467, 808, 482]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 484, 565, 497]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 499, 478, 512]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 515, 361, 528]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 531, 483, 544]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 547, 335, 560]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 562, 466, 576]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 578, 664, 607]]<|/det|>
